ygData.subject: RE: Stupid Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s for this reason I was extremely excited to make level 24.  Once in Qeynos, I got stuck in the twisty zone corridor by the bard guild, and went back
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 8 Dec 1999, Joshua R. Moore wrote:

> talking about, as I am human, and have had to learn to travel without a
> light stone, and without infravision in pitch blackness;) Can you say walk a
> few steps, pulse Selos for the moment flash, walk a few steps.. =)

It's for this reason I was extremely excited to make level 24. Once in
Qeynos, I got stuck in the twisty zone corridor by the bard guild, and
went back and forth about ten times because I couldn't see which way I was
facing.

After 24, Lyssa's Voracious Concord is a must mem for trips back to
corpse.

Athren
